DOC.brief_summary: To design Computer Aided Telephone Interviewing ( CATI ) software tool survey research .

Its use steadily increase 1995 major technology use almost every NIH Institute . Although CATI use many year , implementation keep technological development computer . This product application 3000 U.S. company engage public opinion market research .
